languages.text: {n}Правду говорят — сколько миров, столько форм веры в Бога-Императора. Так что неудивительно, что тассерианские догматы облечены в почти поэтичную историю.{/n}
{n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Правду говорят — сколько миров, столько форм веры в Бога-Императора. Так что неудивительно, что тассерианские догматы облечены в почти поэтичную историю.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many worlds, so many ways of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n} ok?
{n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many worlds, so many ways of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n} ok?
{n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}
{n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}

languages.text: {n}言われるとおりだ。世界の数だけ、神皇帝への信仰の道がある。だからタッセーラ派の教義が、ほとんど詩みたいな形になっていても、別に驚かない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}言われるとおりだ。世界の数だけ、神皇帝への信仰の道がある。だからサセリア派の教義が、ほとんど詩みたいな形になっていても、別に驚かない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Como reza el dicho: existen tantas formas de profesar la fe en el Dios Emperador como mundos en el universo. No es de extrañar que la doctrina thasseriana haya adoptado una forma casi poética.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Como reza el dicho: existen tantas formas de profesar la fe en el Dios Emperador como mundos en el universo. No es de extrañar que la doctrina thasseriana haya adoptado una forma casi poética.{/n}

languages.text: {n}俗话说得好，有多少形形色色的世界，就有多少形形色色的方式来崇拜神皇。因此，塔瑟拉的神皇信仰采取了某种近乎诗意的形式，也委实不足为奇。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}俗话说得好，有多少形形色色的世界，就有多少形形色色的方式来崇拜神皇。因此，塔瑟拉的神皇信仰采取了某种近乎诗意的形式，也委实不足为奇。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie heißt es so schön? So zahlreich die Welten sind, so mannigfaltig ist der Glaube an den Gottimperator. Es überrascht also nicht, dass die thesserianische Doktrin nahezu poetisch ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie heißt es so schön? So zahlreich die Welten sind, so mannigfaltig ist der Glaube an den Gottimperator. Es überrascht also nicht, dass die thesserianische Doktrin nahezu poetisch ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme le dit l'adage, les mondes sont aussi nombreux que les voies menant à la foi en l'Empereur-Dieu, il n'est donc pas surprenant que la doctrine thasserienne ait été rédigée de façon presque poétique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme le dit l'adage, les mondes sont aussi nombreux que les voies menant à la foi en l'Empereur-Dieu, il n'est donc pas surprenant que la doctrine thasserienne ait été rédigée de façon presque poétique.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne kadar çok dünya varsa Tanrı İmparator'a o kadar farklı şekilde iman edilir deyişi gerçekten de doğruymuş. Thassera öğretisinin neredeyse şiirsel bir biçime sahip olmasına şaşmamalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Indeed, the saying holds: as many the worlds, so many the paths of faith in the God-Emperor. Thus, it is no surprise that Thasserian doctrine is cast in an almost poetic form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ne kadar çok dünya varsa Tanrı İmparator'a o kadar farklı şekilde iman edilir deyişi gerçekten de doğruymuş. Thassera öğretisinin neredeyse şiirsel bir biçime sahip olmasına şaşmamalı.{/n}
